content: The problem is I want all AP activities to be condensed down to either a Post or User object, but those objects are quite limited. Idk I will just look at what type of data this specific post has in AP and implement that into the Post object

source.content:
The problem is I want all AP activities to be condensed down to either a Post or User object, but those objects are quite limited.
Idk I will just look at what type of data this specific post has in AP and implement *that* into the Post object
